summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the municipal light and power plant and system, and amending Section 4 of Ordinance No. 36852, approved December 22, 1916, as amended by ordinances numbered 38065 and 38469, approved, respectively, December 27, 1917 and May 27, 1918.
